post:
Hello Let People , 

we hope with this deal we got your attencion for Black Friday :

Today we will offer a cupon code for all shared accounts wich is cut off 70% from the normal price. This cupon can be used only one time/client , including the existing customers. The cupon code is : **LET70-OFF** and can be used in the follow products :

[Reseller ssd plans](http://en.hostsolutions.ro/hosting/reseller-hosting/) 

[Shared hosting account cpanel ](http://en.hostsolutions.ro/hosting/shared-hosting/)

Server spec :


<br />Intel Xeon CPU 2x6 core 2.67 (24 threads) 
<br />SSD (12gbps interface) raid 10 
<br />240 gb ram 
<br />2x1gbps port speed (1 dedicated , 1 shared) 
<br />cpanel+cloudlinux+litespeed+Softaculos 
<br />[Located in Romania](http://www.hostsolutions.ro)


<br />Disk Speed 
<br />---------- 
<br />I/O (1st run) : 769 MB/s 
<br />I/O (2nd run) : 735 MB/s 
<br />I/O (3rd run) : 717 MB/s 
<br />Average I/O : 740.333 MB/s

WE WILL NEVER OVERSELL THIS KIND OF SERVICE ! ALL RESOURCES IS DEDICATED ! THE MINIMAL RAM ALOCATED IS 1GB/ACCOUNT BY DEFAULT.

This offer is valid until 27.11.2016 or until the server is full (200 accounts)

**
You can find there 1gb webspace for only 0.086 eur/mo**


Regards, 
Marius
